lead_paragraph: Patrik Elias, the 30-year-old left wing - who is the Devils' most important player other than their franchise goaltender, Martin Brodeur - indicated that his first preference would be to remain with the organization.
snippet: Patrik Elias, the 30-year-old left wing - who is the Devils' most important player other than their franchise goaltender, Martin Brodeur - indicated that his first preference would be to remain with the organization.
